meanings.sent1: The factum of finishing his homework made him happy.
meanings.sent2: She watched the factum of the bird building its nest.
meanings.sent3: The factum of the dog chasing its tail was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The factum of the sun setting painted the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent5: The factum of the baby taking its first steps was a joyous moment for the family.

meanings.definition: A statement or assertion of verified information.
meanings.sent1: Her factum about the upcoming event was accurate.
meanings.sent2: The factum in the newspaper was about the new law.
meanings.sent3: His factum that he could fly like a bird was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The factum that love knows no boundaries is a beautiful sentiment.
meanings.sent5: The factum that the earth revolves around the sun is a well-known scientific fact.
